conbody.p: Approval times vary depending on current volume and the team's availability, submissions fall into an internal queue which the team works through chronologically as they come in. Our team checks a range of requirements for your plugin, like whether it installs properly and has documentation. In order to avoid unnecessary updates and resubmissions, make sure your plugin adheres to the guidelines on this page. If you believe your approval is taking too long, feel free to contact our team via store@katalon.com.

ul.li: Log in to https://store.katalon.com with your Katalon account.
Click New Plugin button in Published Plugins tab.
Upload your file and fill out the plugin information form (Refer to Plugin Documents Guidelines) to learn how to submit documents for published plugins).
Accept the Developer Agreement, and submit your plugin.
Back to Published Plugins tab and click Publish below your plugin.
You'll be notified via email that your submission was successful, and receive a URL to view the approval status.
Once approved, your plugin is published to .
